title: Mediocredito Centrale|Invitalia
snippet: Mediocredito Centrale - Banca del Mezzogiorno was acquired by Invitalia in August 2017 to develop synergies with the offer of incentives to enterprises and to promote growth policies.

title: Banca del Mezzogiorno – MedioCredito Centrale - Wikipedia
snippet: In August 2017 the ownership of the bank was entirely transferred to Invitalia S.p.A., a development agency owned by the Ministry of Economy and Finance. In 2020, following the bailout of Banca Popolare di Bari, Mediocredito Centrale took the control of Popolare di bari, which led in 2021 to ...

title: Mediocredito Centrale 2025 Company Profile: Valuation, Funding & Investors | PitchBook
snippet: Mediocredito Centrale has raised $963M. Invitalia has invested in Mediocredito Centrale.

title: Mediocredito Centrale SpA
snippet: Rome, 28 January 2025 – Mediocredito Centrale S.p.A. (“MCC”) and Banca del Fucino S.p.A. (“BdF”) announce that they have signed, at the headquarters of Invitalia, the sale and purchase agreement for the transfer of the 85.3% stake held by MCC in Cassa di Risparmio di Orvieto S.p.A.

title: Mediocredito Centrale: le nuove nomine del Consiglio di Amministrazione - Invitalia
snippet: L’ Assemblea ordinaria dei soci di Mediocredito Centrale ha nominato i nuovi Consiglieri di Amministrazione e il Presidente.
